archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: BACS server
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
In house - does student bursaries (as well as doing all all BACS payments) Results of goes into student info
Contact: Catherine Jewell
https://wikis.bris.ac.uk/display/adt/BACS+Support The software for the BACS is located on the machine its-bacs-p.cse.bris.ac.uk, under C:\paybase. The database behind the BACS software is ORACLE and the username and password can be found under Finance -> Paybase. web based software C-Series by Bottomline https://its-bacs-p.cse.bris.ac.uk/Paybase/ux
